title: Homeland Security Funding Bill Caught Up In House
teaser: With Senate passage of a $40 billion funding bill for the Department of Homeland Security, all eyes turn to House Speaker John Boehner. The Senate's bill does not contain language blocking President Obama's executive actions on immigration, which many House conservatives have insisted upon.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
